Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.planning.ldm.trigger

Interface Summary
TriggerAction A TriggerAction performs an action (presumed to be publishing changes to the LDM) when 'fired'.
TriggerMonitor A TriggerMonitor determines a particular set of objects on which to search for a particular condition.
TriggerTester A TriggerTester determines a particular condition exists on a particular set of objects.
 

Class Summary
Trigger A Trigger is an object containing information indicating an action to be taken if a particular state exists among a specified set of objects.
TriggerAlertAction A trigger action to generate an alert
TriggerMakeStaleAction TriggerAction to make given allocation object
TriggerMakeTaskAction Trigger action to generate a new task when fired - abstract method for task generation
TriggerManagerPlugin This plugin manages triggers that have been created in a given agent.
TriggerPredicateBasedMonitor A TriggerPredicateBasedMonitor is a kind of monitor that generates a subscription for objects
TriggerRescindAction Trigger action to rescind given Plan Element when fired
TriggerStaleTester A Trigger Tester to determine if an allocation is stale
TriggerThresholdTester Abstract Threshold trigger tester to fire if a given computed parameter value exceeds a given threshold.
TriggerTimeBasedMonitor A TriggerTimeBasedMonitor is a kind of monitor that generates an interrupt at regular intervals to check for a particular condition on a fixed set of objects Uses system time
